# Simple Zuora Client
## Version 0.1

It works with ZuoraÂ® API v1.

*Currently supported features*

* Authentication session
* Multi entity support
* AQuA batch queries (ZOQL)
* get accounting periods
* get sequences
* get invoice by invoice number
* update account
* update credit memo
* cancel credit memo
* update invoice

*Requirements*

* requests_oauthlib
* oauthlib.oauth2
* requests
